name: cancel_reminder
description: Cancels an existing reminder by ID or by searching for it by title/description. Use this when the user wants to cancel, delete, or remove a reminder they no longer need. Supports both exact ID lookup and fuzzy title matching.

reminder_id.description: The exact UUID of the reminder to cancel. Use this if you have the ID from list_reminders.

search_term.description: Search term to find the reminder by title (case-insensitive partial match). Use this when the user refers to a reminder by description like 'cancel my glasses reminder'.

confirm_multiple.description: If true and multiple reminders match, cancel all of them. Default is false (asks for clarification).
